Engine Programmer and Technical Artist

James Hawk

Engine Programmer at CCP Games, working on EVE Online. Indie developer working on HawkEngine and PS1 style 3D platformer. Unity 3D asset creator. Interesting guy.

Hello there!

Who are you?

I am James, a professional game developer traditionally educated as a software engineer, but with an interest in art asset creation too. Yep, both, odd.
